## Chess.fen() method

Returns the FEN string for the current position.

```js
const chess = new Chess()

// make some moves
chess.move('e4')
chess.move('e5')
chess.move('f4')

chess.fen()
// -> 'rnbqkbnr/pppp1ppp/8/4p3/4PP2/8/PPPP2PP/RNBQKBNR b KQkq f3 0 2'

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fen(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string
